data.name: Arrange Drivers for Race
data.description:
The first true car race was held in 1895. Since then lots of things have been changed. 
There are some important information provided to fans before race starts like best qualification time,racer number,racer name,start position and time penalty.

On the current race there are different types of penalty given in secuneds. The only rule is that drivers don't have over a minute penalty.

There are some information provided as an object in array your job is to assign a position to them and arrange based on position.

Input array is arrived based on time they are achived.
Better position is taken by racer achieved it earlier.

Make sure the you calculate their ```amended``` time.

Result should look the same
```
[{   
  racerNumber:47,
  racerName:'Mick Schumacher',
  qualificationTime: '1:22.248',
  penalty:0,
  amended: '1:22.248',
  startPosition: 1
},{
  racerNumber:14,
  racerName:'Fernando Alonso',
  qualificationTime: '1:21.069',
  penalty:5,
  amended: '1:26.069',
  startPosition: 2
}]
```
